name: UNIV_CHG_LN_MOD
description: This table contains modifier information for charges in the Universal Charge Line (UCL) master file.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the�charge line�record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Each Universal Charge Line can have multiple modifiers associated with it.  The combination of UCL_ID and LINE make up a unique identifier for this modifier.

columns.name: MODIFIER_ID
columns.description: The modifier associated with the Universal Charge Line.

columns.name: MODIFIER_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
